com.bobman159.rundml.core.exceptions

Class RunDMLException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.bobman159.rundml.core.exceptions.RunDMLException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RunDMLException
extends java.lang.Exception
    A wrapper class for RunDML exceptions that are encountered during SQL Building or execution.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • createRunDMLException

        public static RunDMLException createRunDMLException(java.lang.Throwable reason,
                                                    int execPhase,
                                                    java.lang.Object... args)
        Create an instance of a RunDMLException with a specified reason
        Parameters:
        reason - the reason the exception occurred
        execPhase - the type of error
        args - arguments for error, null may be used if no arguments
        Returns:
        a RunDMLException

      • getRunDMLMessage

        public java.lang.String getRunDMLMessage()
        Returns text indicating the type of error that occurred
        Returns:
        - a text string of the error type, " " is returned for unknown error codes

      • getExecutionPhase

        public int getExecutionPhase()
        Return the execution phase code when the exception occurred
        Returns:
